sentences.sContent: This opera is one of the cultural totems of Western civilization.
sentences.sCn: 这部歌剧是西方文明的文化标志之一。

trans.tranCn: 图腾, 标识, 徽章
trans.tranOther: an animal, plant etc that is thought to have a special  spiritual  connection with a particular tribe, especially in North America, or a figure made to look like the animal etc
